name: Anguis.h
description:
Anguis.h is a text adventure game, with over 30 different endings, that will put you in a sticky situation: a virus takes control of your AI home assitant through a videogame installed on your PC. From that moment on, you'll be fighting against the virus' challenges trying to avoid the horrible deaths that lurk around every corner; who knows, maybe in the meantime you'll even find a way to get rid of the evil bastard!

CREDITS

Game Design:

Vito Palermo

Angelo Maggi

Leonardo Gentili
